name: T-minus DOGE
description:
Help Doge reach the Moon while dodging Rocks
and collecting Coins, Bones, and Stars along the way!

Thank You for playing T-minus DOGE!
We're Matt & Ally and this is our first game!
We learned a lot throughout the week, and had lots of fun.

Share your scores in the comments, how high or low can you score?
